originalText.text: I am eagerly anticipating my upcoming appointment, as it will transport me to the realm with its cutting-edge technology.  I am filled with excitement for my appointment scheduled on the 12th of January. I am sincerely appreciate the remarkable experience. Happy New Year!

text.text: I am eagerly anticipating my upcoming appointment, as it will transport me to the realm with its cutting-edge technology.  I am filled with excitement for my appointment scheduled on the 12th of January. I am sincerely appreciate the remarkable experience. Happy New Year!

originalText.text:
Earlier today, 11/16,  was my 2nd experience here, the first was a few months ago before the summer after I was diagnosed as a diabetic and it was easy peasy. This visit was because of an urgent issue, that wasn’t resolved after an urgent care visit a week before. I can only commend the staff & Dr. Cruz for the thoroughness. I was in some severe pain/discomfort but I definitely want to thank the medical assistant/tech for doing her job and making me as comfortable as possible, when I confirm her name, which I will,  I’ll add.
Follow up visit will be in a week, looking forward & hoping the recommendations/Dx will help aside from what I knew was not the answer from the urgent care.
Again urgent cares do triage but are not the experts to certain matters.

originalText.text: Overall, I was very pleased with the professionalism, and organization of this opthamology practice....especially on such a rainy day. However, I do wish they could have billed me for my $45.00 co-pay instead of demanding, nicely, during sign in. All of my prior medical, and vision care specialists connected with New York Presbyterian Hospital, and/or Columbia Presbyterian Hospitals always billed me within a month of the office visit, and I always paid. Sincerely, Ken Ware.

originalText.text: I went there for the first time,the whole staff there are spectacular. Very kind and professional. Excellent place,very clean. State of the art machines.

text.text: I went there for the first time,the whole staff there are spectacular. Very kind and professional. Excellent place,very clean. State of the art machines.

originalText.text: The only complaint that I have is that I wasn't seen until an hour after my appointment time, which was an issue for me because I was on a time schedule for the day, but the staff is very nice and professional.
